implementation.useCase: Skillfully uses Claude to power AI-driven job simulations that allow candidates to demonstrate their actual skills in realistic workplace scenarios, rather than relying on traditional resumes. Claude powers their 'Lego LLM' infrastructure which combines multiple AI models to create seamless simulated experiences without requiring additional model training for each new simulation.
implementation.problem: Traditional resume-based hiring is broken as candidates can use AI to mass-generate perfectly tailored applications, making it difficult for employers to identify genuine talent. Employers need a way to evaluate candidates based on actual skills rather than claimed credentials.
implementation.integrationMethod: Integrated into Skillfully's 'Lego LLM' infrastructure which combines multiple AI models working together
